settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Water, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Sterols, Cholesterol, Phytosteryl/Behenyl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Niacinamide, Squalane, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Panthenol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Tromethamine, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunﬂower) Seed Oil, Carbomer, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Polyglutamic Acid, Ceramide NP, Stearic Acid, Allantoin, Adenosine, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Lupinus Albus Seed Extract, Fragaria Chiloensis (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Crataegus Cuneata Fruit Extract, Viola Odorata Flower/Leaf Extract, Leucojum Aestivum Bulb Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunﬂower) Flower Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Pancratium Maritimum Extract, Tuber Melanosporum Extract, Tuber Aestivum Extract, Tuber Magnatum Extract, Hesperidin




Note: The above ingredients have been declared in descending order of their concentrations.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW


STEP 1

After the Microfluidizer Ampoule, utilize provided spatula to place a nickel sized amount of cream on the face.


STEP 2

Massage cream in with hands.


WHEN

Day and night.

Click Here for Full Set of Steps

settings.text:
1. Power-packed cream to infuse your skin with total nourishment.
  2. The Microfluidizer Technology utilizes a high pressure, three-step process, to create nanosized liposomes, which are more easily absorbed.
  3. These nanosized liposomes act as delivery vehicles for transporting substances into the body, allowing them to reach the deeper layers of the skin beyond just the epidermis.
  4. Creams are basic forms of hydration in any skincare routine, but this cream is different - a radiance moisturizer for supple, bright, and youthful skin.
  5. Its 100% microfluidized nano-liposome nature ensures proper absorption of every active ingredient into your skin such that target activities can be achieved.
  6. Not only will you feel the hydration of the emollient, smooth formula, you'll see the rejuvenating benefits of our proprietary ingredients.

Inspired by eastern holistic practices in self-care, RIMAN aims to improve professional and personal lives across the world by inspiring people to embrace the sacred practice of slowing down and honoring oneself; to view self-care as much more than a chore or routine, but rather an ancient ritual with holistic benefits.
